messages.subject: Re:Need for a diploma
messages.msgSnippet: ... I wonder?  We lived in PA for several years. They ask for a copy of your HS diploma in order to homeschool your kids. If my kids ever end up in PA,
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, sluror@j... wrote:
<>I wonder? We lived in PA for several years. They ask for a copy of
your HS diploma in order to homeschool your kids. If my kids ever end
up in PA, decide to homeschool their kids and send in a copy of a
diploma I create for them today, I wonder if it'll work. PA laws
inhale wind!<>

Sharon:

Simple solution! Make it look good and what are they going to do
about it? My daughter turned down a full 4 year scholarship to a
very nice private school because she prefers unschooling. The
diplomas from this very nice private boarding school are not fancy.
I could duplicate one of theirs any day. My own from high school is
not fancy, either. Soooooooo, unless PA has laws or regulations that
make you provide a certified high school transcript who is going to
know?

Norma

messages.subject: Re:Need for a diploma
messages.msgSnippet: ... I wonder? We lived in PA for several years. They ask for a copy of your HS diploma in order to homeschool your kids. If my kids ever end up in PA, decide
messages.messageBody:
>Print your own diplomas! They are probably at least as significant
>as any other diploma.

I wonder?
We lived in PA for several years. They ask for a copy of your HS diploma
in order to homeschool your kids. If my kids ever end up in PA, decide to
homeschool their kids and send in a copy of a diploma I create for them
today, I wonder if it'll work. PA laws inhale wind!

Sharon
